import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; import { useSelector,useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import {listCatByProduct} from "../actions/products"; const ProductByCategory = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const pData = useSelector(state => state.productsApi); useEffect(()=>{ const fData = { 'id':atob(props?.match?.params?.id) } dispatch(listCatByProduct(fData)); },[]); return (
